segments.text: I'm just observing this kitchen scene unfold before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The line drawing style gives it a somewhat surreal quality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely absorbed in her task, almost meditative.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the sink is overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the edge in a steady stream, creating a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in it, yet she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so unaware of such a clear danger?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry she might slip and hurt herself on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is already flowing down the cabinet doors too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could cause some serious damage if not stopped soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how focused she is on that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR
